title: HOUSE CALLS with Dr. Roy: Tips for Treating the "Tummy Bug" (Video) - Mindful Family Medicine
author: Dr Roy Steinbock; M D
description: Welcome to our first Episode of HOUSE CALLS with Dr. Roy—quick tips from our house to yours. Tips for Treating the "Tummy Bug" or Acute Gastroenteritis In this video you will learn: How to prevent & treat dehydration from vomiting and diarrhea Which liquids are best and which you should avoid Two effective supplements to take [...]
